text: Trésor Lomana LuaLua (; born 28 December 1980) is a Congolese professional footballer who played as a striker. He is currently the attacking coach for Spalding United. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental
